description.value: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain. When you use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Step]{Step} action, you can ignore difficult terrain caused by flooding, swamps, or quicksand. In addition, when you use the Acrobatics skill to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Balance]{Balance} on narrow surfaces or uneven marshy ground, you aren't @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed}, and if you roll a success on the Acrobatics check, you get a critical success instead.
